commentBody:
""Will he become my new best friend?" Trump asked of Putin in a tweet wondering whether Putin would attend the 2013 Miss Universe pageant Trump brought to Moscow."
- lifted from CNN

Now that he has been elected, lonely Donald Trump, who has been known to refer to many people he has only met casually, if at all, as his "best friends," has found an entire world full of very distinguished people with whom he is suddenly equal. At least on paper. Is anyone surprised that he's making cold calls? Not me. I doubt if most world leaders use Twitter. A shame. He'd be catching a lot of them in the right time zones.
